front.title: IPv4 Support for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This document specifies extensions to Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol for adding IPv4 protocol support. The scope of IPv4 protocol support is two-fold: 1) enable IPv4 home address mobility support to the mobile node. 2) allowing the mobility entities in the Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain to exchange signaling messages over an IPv4 transport network.
